description: Detects modification of an existing service on a compromised host in order to execute an arbitrary payload when the service is started or killed as a method of persistence. Author: Sreeman. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Modification Of Existing Services For Persistence
query: (process.command_line:/(?i)sc config.*binpath=.*/ OR process.command_line:/(?i)sc failure.*command=.*/ OR process.command_line:/(?i).*reg add.*(FailureCommand|ImagePath).*(\.sh|\.exe|\.dll|\.bin$|\.bat|\.cmd|\.js|\.msh$|\.reg$|\.scr|\.ps|\.vb|\.jar|\.pl).*/)
